price: Ta ni ẹni tí ó máa pèsè fún yín tí Ó bá dá arísìkí Rẹ̀ dúró? Ńṣe ni wọ́n ń ṣorí kunkun sí i nínú ìgbéraga àti sísá fún òdodo.
arabic: أَمَّنۡ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي يَرۡزُقُكُمۡ إِنۡ أَمۡسَكَ رِزۡقَهُۥۚ بَل لَّجُّواْ فِي عُتُوّٖ وَنُفُورٍ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: amman hādhā alladhī yarzuqukum in amsaka riz'qahu bal lajjū fī ʿutuwwin wanufūrin
